com.lightattachment
Class MailParser

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      com.lightattachment.MailParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Deprecated. Not used anymore 

public class MailParser
extends java.lang.Thread

This class parse an input stream for mails, store the message parts on the disk, put the mail in the working queue of MailManager. Mails must be separated by MAIL_SEPARATOR.

Version:
0.1a
Author:
Benoit Giannangeli

saveMultipart

public javax.mail.internet.MimeMultipart saveMultipart(MailSet set,
                                                       java.lang.String messageID,
                                                       javax.mail.internet.MimeMultipart multipart)
                                                throws javax.mail.MessagingException,
                                                       java.io.IOException
Deprecated. 
Save the attachments on the disk, remove them from the mail content, and do recursive on nested Multi Parts.

Parameters:
set - The MailSet which will be forwarded to the manager
messageID - The message ID which is used to name the files
multipart - The multi part to save
Returns:
The modified MimeMultipart (without attachment)
Throws:
javax.mail.MessagingException
java.io.IOException
